Deadly Dreams

Release date:
January 1, 1994

James's old star rating:

★★★☆☆

"fairly good."

James's old number rating:

6/10

Old site description:

Tale of a boy who is chosen by an evil wizard to bring forth the destruction of the world. A black spell is cast while he sleeps which causes all of his dreams to come true. Unfortunatley, he can’t help but dream of monsters that kill people. This is my best “illustrated” or “still” movie. (meaning it’s more like a comic book that’s being read for you. I draw everything and do all the voices and sound effects.)

James's old ratings:

Back in 2003 James included star ratings with each film he listed on his filmography on his website.

Later on he switched to ratings out of ten.

Eventually, he dropped the ratings entirely.

This archive is unoffical and run by a fan of Cinemassacre. Contact the Archivist
